title: What is Data Mining?
description: The combined knowledge of statistics, data mining, and machine learning plays a major role in understanding the data and describing the data features to find the relationships and patterns between the data so that we can build a model for further predictions. You must sometimes get confused about how to use these techniques to identify and solve a business problem.
description_lemmatized: combined knowledge statistic data mining machine learning play major role understanding data describing data feature find relationship pattern data build model prediction must sometimes get confused use technique identify solve business problem
